text: A familiar beam of light shines down. The beam of light descends onto a stage. Lightning flashes to reveal Prince Charming riding his valiant steed Chauncey across the ope plains. The wind blows back his golden mane.
sense_profile: Prince Charming riding his valiant steed Chauncey across the ope plains

text: Onward Chauncey, to the highest room of the tallest tower! Where my princess awaits rescue from her handsome Prince Charming. Lightning cracks. Thunder booms. Charming straddles a wooden hobby horse and gallops in place. A stage hand use bellow to blow air into Prince Charming's face. Another stage hand turns a crank that creates the moving backgrou In the orchestra, a man uses coconuts to create the sound effects of a galloping horse. Two more stage hands back stage create the cheap sound effects of thunder and lightning. A crudely constructed castle tower sits in fro of a cheaply painted backdrop. The Fairytale Creatures are sitting at a table in the audience.
This is worse than Love Letters! I hate dinner theatre.
Me too. Pinocchio's nose grows as he is caught in the lie. Prince Charming rides to the base of the tower.
Whoa there, Chauncey! He dismounts and sets his hobby horse on the ground. He strikes a dramatic pose. A Princess leans from a tower window.
Hark! The brave Prince Charming approach-ith. Prince Charming puffs his chest out. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 2.
Fear not fair maiden! I shall slay the monster that guards you and take my place as rightful King. An old couple at a table look confused.
(to old man) What did she say? Prince Charming glares as the bored audience largely igno him. A man in a bad ogre costume comes onto the stage.
Grrrrrrr! The crowd erupts into applause. The Fairytale Creatures cheer.
Woooo hoooo!!!
Yea! Shrek! At first, Prince Charming is put off by the cheers for th Shrek-like beast. He pulls his sword and confronts the monster.
Prepare foul beast to enter into a world of pain with which you are not familiar! He is cut off as a waiter enters with a birthday cake.
Happy Birthday to thee.
Do you mind? Prince Charming hops out of the way when a chair lands on stage. It slides past him and bumps into the tower facade

Do you mind? Bo-ring! Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 3. The audience laughs. Prince Charming glares at them and t tries to recover. He points his sword at the monster agai The tower facade starts to topple.

Prepare foul beast- Prince Charming looks over his shoulder and sees the faca falling. He cringes. The scenery slams against the stage, but Prince Charming unharmed, perfectly framed in the princesses' window. The crowd laughs at the embarrassed Prince Charming. He shake his mangled sword at the audience.
(shaking his sword again) Someday you'll be sorry.
We already are! They laugh again. Prince Charming throws down his sword, picks up his hobby horse and exits.
Grrrrrrr! The song and the laughter follow Prince Charming backstag
Prince Charming walks through a tunnel backstage that lea to a door. The door has a star with his name written on i He opens it.
sense_profile: through a tunnel backstage that lea to a door

text: Prince Charming sits at his broken vanity and sobs. His m shift dressing room is in an alley way next to the theate Horses whinny as a carriage passes by. The castle of Far Away can be seen on the hill in the background. Prince Charming breaks down and cries. He looks up and sees a picture of the Fairy Godmother tap to the vanity. "Don't stop believing! Mommy's Little Ange is written on the picture. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 4.
sense_profile: a picture of the Fairy Godmother tap to the vanity

text: Oh mommy. He weeps again and then looks back at the picture. A determined change grows across his face.
Oh, you're right. I can't let this happen. I can't. Prince Charming looks at the castle on the hill. His expression hardens. He stands and faces the castle. He holds his chin up high.

I am the rightful King of Far Far Away and I promise you this mother. I will restore dignity to my throne! A big gust of wind blows a newspaper page across his face He peels it off and looks at the headline. His eyes tense and narrow.
And this time, no one will stand in my way! In the newspaper is a picture of Shrek and Fiona waving t crowd. Prince Charming crumples up the newspaper in his fists.
The camera booms down from the Far Far Away sign. The sun rises and the birds sing.
The sun shines through the bedroom window as the camera p over to Shrek and Fiona waking up.
Good morning.
Good morning.
Oh... morning breath... Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 5. Shrek breathes in and smiles.
I know. Isn't it wonderful? The bedroom doors fly open and Donkey and the Dronkeys ru in. The Dronkeys head right for Shrek and Fiona. Shrek cowers beneath the bedclothes.

"Good morning! Good morning!" Shrek sinks further into the blankets as the Dronkeys exuberantly lick him. Fiona is amused. Donkey starts to sing "Good Morning" from Singin' in the as he enters the room.
"The sun is shining through! Good morning! Good morning. (coming closer and closer
"To you!"
"And you!"
And you! The Dronkeys fly out of the room, knocking down everythin their path.
Oh, they grow up so fast. Shrek, greatly annoyed, lifts his hand and snuffs out a little fire on the bed left behind by the Dronkeys.
Not fast enough. Puss leaps onto the bed.
Okay. You have a very full day filling in for the King and Queen. There are several functions that require your attendance, sir. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 6.
Great! Let's get started. Shrek immediately pulls the covers up over his head and starts to snore.
C'mon, lazy bones, time to get movin'! Donkey yanks the sheets off of Fiona and Shrek. He is surprised to see Shrek's bare legs.
Aaahhh! You know you really need to get yourself a pair of jammies. Shrek sighs.

The camera pans down from a stained glass window. The son "Royal Pain" by the Eels plays in the background as the title: "Shrek The Third" is superimposed. A large crowd has gathered to watch the knighting. Shrek walks down the aisle of the church. Shrek walks up to the knight who seems a bit nervous. Shrek takes a sword from Puss, but he doesn't have any id what he is supposed to do with it. Shrek looks at Puss, w indicates how to knight a person with his own sword. Shre starts to knight the knight.
sense_profile: The son " Royal Pain " by the Eels
down the aisle of the church

text: I knight thee... Shrek accidentally stabs the knight.
He-he. Ooh. The crowd, Fiona, Puss and Donkey look on, shocked.
Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 7.

Shrek and Fiona officiate at a boat christening for the R Navy. Shrek is holding a bottle of champagne. He leans on the boat, accidentally pushing it down the ramp. Shrek throws the bottle at the boat and it punches an enormous hole in side of the hull. The boat quickly sinks. Shrek turns to find the patrons of Far Far Away shaking t heads as they leave.
sense_profile: an enormous hole in side of the hull
the patrons of Far Far Away shaking t heads as they leave

text: Raul, the make-up specialist, tightens some aprons around Shrek and Fiona. Donkey, Puss and Raul stand in front of them.
Well, since you're filling in for one, you might as well look like a real King. Can somebody come in here and work on Shrek please? Raul stares at Shrek. Shrek raises his eyebrow.

I will see what I can do. He unrolls a satchel full of different gardening tools. Suddenly Shrek's arms and legs are strapped into a chair. A man stands with his back to the camera and pulls on a r cord as if he's holding a chain saw. VROOM! VROOM! He turns around to reveal a circular sander and starts to gr away at Shrek's gruesome toenails. Shrek cringes. We see a close-up of Shrek's eye. A mascara brush comes i frame and pulls at Shrek's eyelash. Fiona gets her nose hairs plucked.

Ow! Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 8. Lipstick is applied to some lips. The camera pulls back t reveal that the lips are Shrek's. A hand tries to tighten a zipper on Shrek's back. It keep snagging on the skin until they finally rip it past and tighten up the zipper all the way. A small sock is placed onto Shrek's foot. With a shoe hor Shrek's foot is shoved into a small shoe. POP! A collar is placed around Fiona's neck and her corset is tightened. A drill comes into frame and tightens the rivet on Shrek' belt. A mole is placed on his cheek.
REVEAL: Shrek and Fiona standing awkwardly in outrageous Renaissance outfits. Donkey gasps.
Oh! Puss rolls his eyes.
Yeah, wow. Fiona is uncomfortable.
Uh, is this really necessary?
Ho, ho. Quite necessary, Fiona.
I'm Shrek, you twit.
Whatever.
Okay peoples! This isn't a rehearsal. Let's see some hustle.

Smiles everyone, smiles! Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 9. Off-screen, the Master of Ceremonies announces the couple arriving at the party. Fiona turns to Shrek and sees he is not in a good mood.
I don't know how much longer I can keep this up Fiona.
I'm sorry Shrek, but can you please just try to grin and bear it? It's just until Dad gets better. Shrek lets out another frustrated sigh.
Shrek?
Yeah.
You look handsome.

Ah. Come here, you. She gives him a supportive smile. He relaxes and smiles back. Fiona puckers up her lips and Shrek leans in for a kiss, their bulky outfits prevent it. Shrek and Fiona let out a huge breath of air.
Oh, my butt is itching up a storm and I can't reach it in this monkey suit! Shrek tries to scratch his butt but to no avail.
Oh.
Hey you. Come here! A man holding a ruby scepter walks over to Shrek.
What's your name? Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 10.
Eh, Fiddlesworth, sir.
Hoo hoo hooo. Perfect.
The announcer introduces Shrek and Fiona.
Ladies and gentlemen, Princess Fiona and Sir Shrek! The audience claps. The curtain starts to open. Fiddlesworth is scratching away at Shrek's butt.
You've done it. Oh, a little over to the left, yeah. That's great.
Uh Shrek? Fiddlesworth struggles to reach Shrek's itch. The crowd looks on in horror. Fiona tries to get his attention.
Ahh! All right, you got it...Oh yeah, you're on it. Oh that's it! Oh that's good!
Shrek...
Oh yeah! Scratch that thing! You got it. You're on it. That's great!
Shrek and Fiddlesworth finally see the crowd. They both freeze. Shrek laughs nervously. Suddenly Shrek's belt buckle snaps off and hits Donkey in eye. He stumbles through the crowd screaming.
Ow!! My eye! My eye! Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 11. As he is stumbling, he grabs hold of a lady in the crowd.

What are you doing? The woman pushes Donkey away. He falls, knocking over a guard holding an axe on his way down. The guard drops the axe. It flies past Puss, who is in the arms of a lady. Th axe knocks over a vase. The vase flies up on stage and Fi maneuvers to catch it. In flight, water spills out of the vase which causes Fiona to fall over. Shrek's tuxedo bib slaps him in the face. The clasp holdi Shrek's pants up breaks off. Shrek stands on stage with h pants around his ankles. He shuffles towards Fiona.
Fiona! He trips over his pants and hits a loose wooden plank on stage. The plank flings up and sends Fiddlesworth flying through the air where his jacket slips over a banner pole trapping him.
Uhhh...
Shrek has reached Fiona who is still lying on the floor.
Are you okay?
Yeah. I'm fine. Fiona's eyes suddenly widen. Fiddlesworth's jacket rips and he falls onto a waiter carrying flaming skewers.

Ahhhh! The skewers fly through the air. Donkey stands up in fram with one eye half shut. The flaming skewers shoot by him land in the curtains, setting them on fire. He blows one the skewers out and takes a bite.

Oh! Shrimp! My favorite. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 12. The fire causes a Far Far Away shield to detach from a wo ceiling beam and fall onto the stage, breaking it in half The whole stage collapses in the middle. The buffet table slide toward Shrek and Fiona at the other end and collide
The door to Fiona's room flies open.
That's it! We're leaving! Shrek storms in pulling bits of buffet food off his face.
Honey, please calm down... Shrek grabs the wig off of his head and throws it aside.

Calm down? Who do you think we're kidding? I am an ogre! I'm not cut out for this, Fiona and I never will be. Shrek wipes off his makeup with his shirt sleeve and flin his shirt to the floor. He falls onto the bed next to Donkey.
I think that went pretty well. Shrek startles.
Donkey! Shrek picks him up and throws him out the door.
Aww, come on now Shrek! Shrek slams the door shut. Shrek turns back towards the bed and sees Puss reclining his pillow. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 13.

Some people just don't understand boundaries. Shrek picks Puss up by the scruff of his neck and tosses outside the window. He shuts it. Puss sits sadly on the ledge, giving Shrek his sad-eyes routine. Shrek draws the blinds. Shrek stomps over and falls back onto the bed. Fiona trie to calm him down.

Just think... a couple more days, and we'll be back home in our vermin-filled shack, strewn with fungus, filled with the rotting stench of mud and neglect. This thought calms him. Shrek takes in a long, deep breat and exhales. He smiles.
Oh, you had me at "vermin-filled."
And, uh... maybe even the pitter- patter of little feet on the floor...?
That's right. The swamp rats will be spawning.
Uh, no... you know, what I was thinking of is a little bit bigger than a swamp rat.
Donkey?
No, Shrek. Um... what if -
Yeah?
They were little ogre feet? Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 14.
Oh.
Shocked, Shrek falls off the bed. He slowly emerges from behind the bed.

Honey? Let's try and be rational about this. Have you seen a baby lately? They just eat and poop and they cry and then they cry when they poop and they poop when they cry...Now, imagine an ogre baby. They extra cry and they extra poop.
Shrek. She grabs his hands and looks deeply into his eyes.
Don't you ever think about having a family? Shrek takes her hand.
Right now, you're my family. There is a knock on the bedroom door. The door bursts ope revealing a Royal Page. Shrek springs up.
Well, somebody better be dying.
The camera pushes through a corridor that leads to the Ki bedroom. The King is lying on his lily pad, coughing.
sense_profile: through a corridor that leads to the Ki bedroom

text: I'm dying. The King inhales and launches into a violent coughing fit Shrek looks a bit guilty about his last admission. The Qu comes to the King's aid and he settles down. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 15.
Harold.
Don't forget to pay the gardener, Lillian. The Queen is used to these kind of non-sequiturs.
Of course darling. The King suppresses a few coughs. He turns to his daughte
Fiona...
Yes Daddy?
I know I've made many mistakes with you.
It's okay.
But your love for Shrek has taught me so much. Fiona smiles. The King addresses Shrek.
My dear boy, I am proud to call you my son.
And I'm proud to call you my Frog... King Dad in-law. Shrek smiles.
Now, there is a matter of business to attend tooo... The King starts wheezing and coughing. Eventually he stop They think he's dead. Puss solemnly removes his hat.
The Frog King is dead. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 16. Fiona starts crying. The King suddenly wakes up, coughing
Put your hat back on, fool.
Shrek, please come hither. Fiona gives Shrek a look. Shrek walks over to the King.
Yeah, Dad?
This Kingdom needs a new king. You and Fiona are next in line for the throne.
Ooo. Next in line. Now you see Dad, that's why people love you. Even on your deathbed you're still making jokes. The King stares at Shrek, stone-faced. Shrek leans in closer.
Oh, come on Dad...an Ogre as King? I don't think that's such a good idea. There's got to be somebody else. Anybody?
Aside from you there is only one remaining heir. Shrek brightens.
Really!? Who is he, Dad?
His name is... is... is...
What's his name? What's his name?
...is ... Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 17. Shrek leans in closer after each "is," waiting in anticipation. The King starts to hyperventilate.
Daddy! The King is dead. A fly comes out of his mouth and flies away. Puss starts to take his hat off. The fly buzzes into fram A tongue catches it. Puss puts his hat back on.
(chewing the fly) His name is Arthur.
Arthur?
I know you'll do what's...
riiiight... He succumbs. The King really is dead now.
Harold!?
Dad? Dad? Dad? Donkey bows his head.

Do your thing, man. Puss takes his hat off. Fiona starts to cry and hugs Shrek. The weight of the Kin request hits Shrek. He is in a state of shock. We hold a moment on the Queen, Shrek, Fiona, Puss and Don to let the King's passing sink in.
Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 18.
The streets of Far Far Away are empty. People are closing the shops on Rodeo Drive.
The knights of Far Far Away march toward the castle as th flag is lowered to half-masked.

Close on a statue of the late King. Shrek, Fiona, the Que and all the Fairy-tale Creatures and Princesses have gath for the funeral. The Queen sets an old shoe box ("Ye Olde Footlocker") on top of a lily pad and sends it floating o into the water. An overhead shot shows the box floating through the lily pads. The camera tilts up to reveal a frog choir, singing "Live and Let Die." The Princesses, Donkey, Puss and the Fairy-tale Creatures all bow their heads solemnly. Shrek puts his arm around Fiona. The funeral has ended and the crowd begins to disperse. Shrek, Fiona and the Queen stand by the pond. The Queen sadly gazes at the pond.
sense_profile: on top of a lily pad
the box floating through the lily pads

text: The camera pulls back to reveal a cloaked figure, on horseback, overlooking the funeral. The figure removes hi hood to reveal Prince Charming. He gives a smug smile, an rides off.
Prince Charming rides up to the Poison Apple Bar. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 19.

Smoke wafts through the screen. The camera pans down to t top of a piano where an ashtray with a lit cigarette burn and a brandy sifter is filled with coins. The camera pans over to a Singing Witch who turns around to reveal a microphone in her hand. The Singing Witch starts to sing "I've Never Been To Me" by Nancy Wilson. The bar is filled with various Fairy-tale Villains. Two pirates sit forlornly with their mugs. The Puppet Master takes a drink out of a beer mug. He is surrounded by a bu of empty beer mugs. Prince Charming enters the bar. A group is gathered around Cyclops riding a medieval mechanical bull, hooting and hollering. The bull stops an the Villains turn to look at Prince Charming. Prince Charming hangs his cape on a tree branch. The came adjusts right to reveal the branch is actually one of the Evil Trees, who flings the cape to the floor. Everyone ta notice as Prince Charming walks through. Little Red Ridin Hood is sitting on a pile of books at a table. Evil Dwarv glare in Prince Charming's direction. Prince Charming wal by a pair of witches (one is the Evil Queen from Snow Whi playing pool. The Evil Queen scratches when she sees him the pool ball goes flying into the Headless Horseman's ne Prince Charming walks by the singing witch. He reaches th bar, pulls out a handkerchief, places it over the bar sto and sits. Prince Charming spots the bartender with her back to him. clears his throat.
sense_profile: when she sees him the pool ball goes flying into the Headless Horseman 's ne Prince Charming walks by the singing witch

text: What does a Prince have to do to get a drink around here? Mabel, the other ugly stepsister, rises up in front a pos with a smiling beer wench.
Ah Mabel, why they call you an ugly stepsister I'll never know. He winks at her. She glares at him.
Where's Doris, taking the night off? Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 20.
She's not welcome here and neither are you. She spits into the mug and wipes it with a towel.
What do you want, Charming?
Oh not much, just a chance at redemption...
And a Fuzzy Navel. Prince Charming stands up and turns to the bar patrons.
And Fuzzy Navels for all my friends! Captain Hook rips his hook across the piano keys. The singing witch bares her teeth. The witches break their po cues. The Puppet Master breaks his beer mug.
We're not your friends. Prince Charming grows nervous. The Villains all approach Prince Charming. From behind the bar, Mabel grabs Prince Charming by his shoulders and pins him on top of the bar.
Ahh! Captain Hook places his hook against Prince Charming's ne
You don't belong here.
You're right; oh, I mean you're absolutely right, but I mean, do any of us?
Do a number on his face! Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 21.
No, no, wait, wait, wait! We are more alike than you think. Prince Charming turns to the Evil Queen.
Wicked Witch. The Seven Dwarves saved Snow White and then what happened?
Oh, what's it to you?
They left you the un-fairest of them all. And now here you are, hustling pool to get your next meal. How does that feel?
Pretty unfair. Prince Charming begins to work the crowd.
And you? Your star puppet abandons the show to go and find his father.
I hate that little wooden puppet. Prince Charming turns to Captain Hook.
And Hook... Prince Charming looks down at the hook.
... Need I say more? Captain Hook backs off, feeling insecure about his append
And you! Frumpypigskin.
Rumplestiltskin.

Where's that first-born you were promised, hey? Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 22. Rumplestiltskin caresses a pacifier tattoo on his forearm Prince Charming gains more confidence as he confronts Mab
Mabel, remember how you couldn't get your little fat foot into that tiny glass slipper? Mabel sighs.
Cinderella is in Far Far Away right now, eating Bon Bons, cavorting with every little last Fairy-tale Creature that has ever done you wrong. Prince Charming now has everyone's attention.
Once upon a time, someone decided that we were the losers. But there are two sides to every story. And our side has not been told. The crowd listens, rapt.

So who will join me? Who wants to come out on top for once? Who wants their happily ever after?! The crowd of villains cheer and starts getting rowdy. A b room brawl ensues. Prince Charming looks on, shocked. He ducks out of the way of a flying liquor bottle. He smiles nervously and lifts his fruity, Fuzzy Navel to drink.
The camera booms down from the lighthouse.

This way gents. The blind mice stumble and fall trying to get down the st to the dock. The Fairy-tale Creatures and Dragon have gathered to wish Shrek, Puss and Donkey a bon voyage as t set off to retrieve Arthur. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 23. On the docks, two Dronkeys chase a seagull as the camera over to Puss who breaks free of the embrace of a lady cat
It's out of my hands senorita, the winds of fate have blown on my destiny. But I will never forget you. You are the love of my life. Off-screen, a cat meows and walks towards Puss.
As are you... Camera pulls out to reveal more and more cats approaching Puss.
And you. Puss starts walking away as two of the cats begin to enga in a cat fight. They are hissing at each other as Puss ba away from them and into another.
And, uh... hi. I don't know you, but I'd like to. I gotta go. Puss runs out of frame. Cut to Dragon, who is talking to Donkey. Puss runs past them in the background. Dragon let out a soft wail.
I know, I know... I don't want to leave you either baby, but you know how Shrek is. The dude's lost without me. She gives him an understanding smile.
But don't worry. I'll send you airmail kisses everyday! He blows her a kiss and she catches it. He looks down at children, holding back tears.

Alright, be strong babies! Be strong. Now, Coco, Peanut, you listen to Mama, alright? And Bananas, no more roastin' marshmallows on your sister's head. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 24. Bananas lets out a fiery sneeze.

Ah, that's my special boy. Oh, come over here, all of you. Give your Daddy a big hug! The baby Dronkeys fly around their Daddy. The Dronkey that Fiona is holding flies off to join Donke and the others. Fiona nervously takes in a breath.
Shrek, maybe you should just stay and be King.
Oh, c'mon, there's no way I could ever run a kingdom. That's why your cousin Arthur's the perfect choice.
It's not that. No. It's, you see...

And if he gives me any trouble, I've always got persuasion and reason. (holds up his right fist) Here's persuasion, (holds up his left fist) and here's reason. Shrek chuckles. Fiona gives him a look. Shrek reassures h
Fiona, soon it's just gonna be you and me and our swamp.
It's not going to be just you and me. The ship's fog horn sounds.
All aboard! Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 25.

It will be. I promise. I love you. He kisses her and joins Puss and Donkey on the boat. He title proudly reads: H.R.M CRUSHING RESPONSIBILITY II The boat sets sail. The Dronkeys spell out "We Love You Daddy" with smoke in the sky.
Awwwwwwwww!
That's lovely. Donkey waves to his kids, sobs.
Bye bye babies! Fiona runs after the boat.
Shrek! Shrek leans against the rail, calling out to her.
Yeah?
Wait!
What is it? She smiles and takes a deep breath.
I'm, I'm- The Ship Captain blows a fog horn and cuts her off. Shrek smiles back at her.
I love you too honey!
No... No, I said I'm pr- Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 26. The Ship Captain starts to blow again. Shrek grabs the ho and throws it overboard.
You're what?!
I said I'm pregnant! The Fairy-tale Creatures behind Fiona cheer.
(doesn't want to believe
Uh... what was that?
You're going to be a father!
That's great.
Really? I'm glad you think so! I love you. Shrek smiles back at Fiona.
Yeah...
Me too... you... Fiona smiles as the Queen places a hand on her shoulder. Overjoyed at the news, Donkey pops up onto the railing.
I'm gonna be an Uncle. I'm gonna be an Uncle! I'm gonna be an Uncle!
Oh, and you my friend are royally-- The fog horn blasts again as the boat disappears into the fog. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 27.
The boat travels along in the open sea. Shrek is fast asl as the boat travels through an estuary and beaches itself Shrek wakes up. He opens the cabin door.
Ahhh. Home. He smiles to himself. The boat has beached itself right outside of Shrek's swamp house. He leaps off the boat.
Woohoo!
Shrek takes a deep breath of swamp air.
sense_profile: a deep breath of swamp air

text: Ahh. He skips and dances happily toward his house.
Shrek!?
Ooo.
He sashays through the front door with his eyes closed, presenting himself.
Fiona! After a moment of silence, he opens his eyes, realizing t Fiona is not there.

Fiona? He looks around the room, puzzled. The door slams closed behind him. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 28. A baby carriage rolls slowly into frame behind him. He tu slowly and sees the baby carriage covered with a blanket. Shrek removes the blanket, revealing a baby ogre, smiling innocently at him.
Huh? Oh no. The baby burps.
Better out than in, I always say. Ha ha!

Hiccup! This time the baby's burp turns into projectile vomit aim directly at Shrek. Shrek puts his hand up to block the vomit, but to no avail. The baby continues to vomit, but eventually stops after completely soiling himself and Shr The baby looks like it's about to cry. Shrek raises his hands.

No, no, no, no, no, no. Ha, ha. It's okay. It's gonna be alright. Shrek picks the baby up, smiling at it cautiously. He hol it awkwardly for a few seconds, then looks up and realize that his house is filled with babies.

Da-Da! Babies roll around his living room, tearing the fabric of his chair. The chair reclines, catapulting one of the bab onto Shrek's head. A standing lamp with a baby on top fal and Shrek dives to catch him. Another baby is pulling the tablecloth, causing lethal knives to fly straight at him. Shrek snatches the baby away just before he is impaled. O of the babies strikes a match near the fireplace. Shrek r over, picks up the baby and blows out the match. He takes baby out of the cauldron.

Hey! Hey, hey, wait! Would ya? No, no. Stop! Hey, hey, hey. No. Shrek panics. A baby is knocking glass jars off the shelf Shrek catches him before he crawls off of it. Shrek runs through the room picking up babies. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 29.
After he has collected as many babies as he can, Shrek sl open the curtain to his bedroom.
Huh? He sees a baby sitting in his bed, smiling up at him. The baby shrugs.

Bubabatoo? Suddenly, Shrek hears a loud rumble. He turns around. Babies start pouring out of the window and the fireplace. First there is one, then two, then thirty more follow. Hundreds of them start piling in. Shrek makes a run for the doorway, but no matter how hard runs, the doorway keeps getting farther and farther away! keeps trying, hundreds of babies trailing behind.

Finally, Shrek reaches the door and opens it. He slams it shut behind him and closes his eyes. Everything is quiet. He opens his eyes and finds himself on stage in front of high school. Shrek looks up to find a graduation cap on his head. The audience is full of ogre babies laughing at him. The came pulls back to reveal Shrek standing at the podium, naked.
sense_profile: a graduation cap on his head

text: Shrek's eyes pop open, he sits upright and tries to compo himself.

Ahhhh! Oh, Donkey! Donkey, wake- up! Donkey and Puss turn around, but they both have baby-ogre faces! Donkey makes a baby noise. As the camera zooms in, Donkey's eyes glow red and his teeth become sharp and poi Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 30.
(with ogre baby head) Da-da! A fog horn blows. Shrek bolts upright again. Donkey and Puss wake up.
Ahhhh! He breaths heavily, trying to compose himself.
Shrek. Shrek, are you okay?
Oh... I can't believe I'm going to be a father. Donkey and Puss look at each other. He gets up and walks the ship's railing.
How did this happen?
Allow me to explain. You see, when a man has certain feelings for a woman, a powerful urge sweeps over him...
I know how it happened. I just can't believe it. Shrek walks away. Donkey leans over to Puss.
How does it happen? Puss rolls his eyes at Donkey.
Donkey sees Shrek at the back of the boat staring out at distant horizon. He walks up next to his friend.
And the cat's in the cradle and the silver spoon,
Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 31.
Little boy blue and the man in the moon. Shrek rolls his eyes.
"When you coming home, son?" "I don't know when, But we'll get together then, Dad-" Shrek cuts Donkey off.
Donkey, can you just cut to the part where you're supposed to make me feel better? Shrek slumps against the rail. Puss hops up on the railin and whispers into Shrek's other ear.
You know I love Fiona, Boss. Right?

But what I'm talking about here is you, me, my cousin's boat, an ice- cold pitcher of mojitos, and two weeks of nothing but fishing. Puss makes a "let's go fishing" gesture by casting an imaginary rod into the ocean. Donkey is right there to whisper in Shrek's other ear.
Man, don't you listen to him. Having a baby is not going to ruin your life.
It's not my life I'm worried about ruining. It's the kid's. Donkey and Puss pause as Shrek rants.

I mean...when have you ever heard the phrase "as sweet as an...ogre" or "as nurturing as...an ogre" Or how `bout..."you're gonna' love my dad...he's a real ogre." Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 32.
Okay, okay I get it! Nobody said it was going to be easy. But at least you got us to help you out.
That's true. He thinks for a moment.
I'm doomed.
You'll be fine.
You're finished. Everyone turns to look at the Captain who clears his thro
Uh, with your journey. He points to shore. A majestic castle stands proudly on a nearby bluff.
Shrek, Puss and Donkey stand at the entrance to the castl Donkey reads the sign hanging over the entrance.
Wor-ces-ter-shireee. Now that sounds fancy.
It's Worcestershire.
Like the sauce!? Mmmm... It's spicy! The drawbridge to the castle lowers.

Oohh! They must be expecting us. They start over the drawbridge. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 33. A horse whinnies behind them. Shrek, Donkey, and Puss jum out of the way as a medieval school bus storms by. The ki on the back of the bus scream when they see Shrek.
What in the shista-shire kind of place is this? Shrek suddenly looks concerned.
Well, my stomach aches and my palms just got sweaty. Must be a high school.
High school?!
A group of cheerleaders practice.

Ready?! Okay! Where for art thou headed, to the top? Yeah we think so, we think so! And dost thou thinkest thine can be stopped? Nay we thinks not! We thinks not! Shrek rolls his eyes and continues on, terrifying student he walks through the courtyard.
Ahhhhh! The kid runs away quickly into the student parking lot wh a bunch of different style horse-drawn carriages are park A carriage passes in front of Shrek that reads: "Caution Student Driver."
All right Mr. Percival, just ease up on the reigns- The carriage jolts forward and crashes off-screen. Two stoner kids emerge from a medieval-style "VW" carriag
sense_profile: from a medieval - style " VW " carriag

text: (cough, cough) For lo bro, don't burn all my frankincense and myrrh. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 34.
I'm already starting to feel nauseous from memories of wedgies and swirlies!
But how did you receive the wedgies when you are clearly not the wearer of the underpants?
Let's just say some things are better left unsaid and leave it at that. He notices two female students discussing their love live
So then I was all like "I'd rather get the black plague and lock myself in an iron maiden than go out with you."
Eh, totally. Shrek approaches them.
Pardon me... They flee in terror.
Eh! Totally ew-th!
Yeah, totally! A pair of dorky kids play a medieval, role-playing board game.
Yes! I just altered my character level to plus three superbability.
Hi, we're looking for someone named-
Gee, who rolled a plus nine "dork" spell and summoned the beast and his quadrupeds. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 35.
Ha! Ha!
Ah! The students panics when his nose starts to bleed.
I know you're busy "not fitting in" but can either of you tell me where I can find Arthur? While Xavier tries to control the bleeding, Gary points towards the athletic field.
He's over there.

In the distance, Shrek spots A BOLD KNIGHT atop his steed He looks very impressive as he rears up ready to charge. Shrek, Donkey and Puss arrive to see the beginning of the charge. It's an exciting back and forth. Hooves pound on sand. The Knight's eyes steady. The horse rears majestically. The opponent's eyes widen in fear. The lance hits, and the opponent flies through the air an lands in front of Shrek, Puss and Donkey. Shrek looks back at the victorious Knight. He removes his helmet revealing a strong handsome face. The Knight enjoy his victory.
sense_profile: to see the beginning of the charge

text: Ha ha! There is no sweeter taste on thy tongue than victory!
Oy! Right! Ooo! Ooo! Ooo! Shrek turns to Puss. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 36.
Strong, handsome, face of a leader. Does Arthur look like a King or what? Shrek steps forward.
Ow. Shrek looks down, his foot planted square in the chest of LANCELOT's opponent. Shrek steps back.
Oh. Sorry. The kid doesn't budge, his arms and legs still sprawled o where he hit the ground.
Did you just say you were looking for Arthur? Shrek, Puss and Donkey turn back around.
That information is on a need to know basis.
It's top secret, hushity hush.
The Knight commands his troops.
Now gentlemen let's away... to the showers!

Oy! Right! Ooo! Ooo! Shrek approaches the Knight. The Knight's horse rears up and he falls off. The horse gallops off. The Knight looks up at Shrek in fear. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 37.
Greetings your majesty. This is your lucky day.
So what for like are you supposed to be? Some kind of giant mutant leprechaun or something?
Oh, ho, ho, ho. Giant mutant leprechaun... You made a funny. Shrek scoops up the Knight, tosses him over his shoulder, ogre-style.
Unhand me, monster!
Stop squirming, Arthur.
I'm not Arthur! Shrek stops and holds Lancelot above his head. Lancelot tries to regain his dignity.
I am Lancelot. Lancelot points across the school yard.
That dork over there is Arthur! He points to the TEENAGE ARTHUR, skulking away across the school yard.
Hey! Artie turns his head briefly, but keeps on walking. Shrek sighs and dumps Lancelot to the ground.
Aaah. Shrek storms off towards the school. Puss and Donkey catc up. One of the female students steps in front of Shrek. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 38.
Ahem! This is like totally embarrassing, but my friend Tiffany thinkest thou vex her so soothly... The other girls giggle.
And she thought perchance thou would wanna ask her to the Homecoming Dance or something...
Uh, excuse me?
It's like whatever. She's just totally into college guys and mythical creatures and stuff. She pops her gum.
Shrek and Puss search the hallways, looking for Artie.

Oh Arthur! Come out, come out wherever you are... Off-screen we hear mumbling from inside a locker. Shrek a Puss look as Donkey pushes the locker door open. He has b stuffed inside. Off-screen we hear some students laughing

Yeah, you better run, you little punk no good-niks, `cause the days of "Little Donkey Dumpy Drawers" are over! An "I Suck-eth" sign has been taped Donkey's butt. Shrek spots students entering the Gymnasium. They approac HALL MONITOR who stops them.
Hold it... Two mascot costumed students walk up to the hall monitor. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 39.
We're here for the Mascot Contest.
Grrrrr! The Hall Monitor waves them in. Shrek gets an idea.
(pleased with himself) We're here for the Mascot Contest too. The Hall Monitor reaches out and starts painfully pinchin and pulling Shrek's skin. Shrek tries to hide the pain.
This is a costume?
Aaaiyyyy... worked on it all night long! The Hall Monitor lets his face snap back into place. Shre struggles not to scream in agony. Hall Monitor is still suspicious.
Looks pretty real to me.
If it were real could I do this? Puss's claws snap out one at a time like jack-knives and Puss jabs all the claws deep into Shrek's butt.
Or this? Donkey kicks Shrek hard in the groin with his hind legs. Shrek winces and sweats.
He's right! If it were real that would have been agonizingly painful!
Now watch this.... Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 40.
That's quite enough boys.
Principal Pynchley presides over an assembly for the enti student body. He speaks through a megaphone.
Thank you to Professor Primbottom for his invigorating lecture on how to just say "nay". Two students are standing next to Pynchley. One is dresse up like a dragon and the other as a griffin.
And now, without further ado, let's give a warm Worcestershire-hoozah to the winner of our "New Mascot" contest... the-- Shrek bursts through the double-doors of the gym.
--ogre? The students gasp as Shrek marches forward.
That's right. I'm the new mascot. So let's really try and beat the other guys... at whatever it is they're doing. The band plays Smashmouth's "Rock Star."
This is indeed all a bit unorthodox. Without breaking stride, Shrek grabs Principal Pynchley's megaphone.

Now, where can I find Arthur Pendragon? Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 41. The students all point... to the basketball hoop, where A hangs helplessly. Shrek, Donkey and Puss turn and look up and see the freshly wedgied student. The students laugh. In the front row, Lancelot bumps fists with Bohort.
Classic. Donkey turns to Lancelot.
You should be ashamed of yourself.
I didn't do it. They did. Lance points to the D&D nerds. They are beside themselves with nasal laughter. Nosebleed boy starts bleeding again. Shrek reaches up and pulls Artie down to eye level.
Please don't eat me.
Eat him! Eat him! Even Principal Pynchley gets caught up in the excitement.
Eat him! Shrek yanks on Artie and pulls him off the hoop.
I'm not here to eat him.
It's time to pack up your toothbrush and jammies. You're the new King of Far Far Away.
What? The students react with surprise and disbelief. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 42.
Artie a King? More like the Mayor of Loserville.
Nice one Lance! They high five. The tuba player plays a Wha-wha-wha.
Burn. Everyone laughs.
Is this for real?
Absolutely. Now clean out your locker, kid. You've got a kingdom to run.
So wait, I'm really the only heir? Shrek pauses for just a moment, then...
The one and only.
Give me just a second. Artie turns back to the crowd and delivers a heartfelt speech.

My good people, I think there's a lesson here for all of us. Maybe the next time you're about to dunk a kid's head in a chamber pot, you'll stop and think, hey, maybe this guy has feelings. Maybe I should cut him some slack. Because maybe, just maybe... this guy's gonna turn out to be, uh...I dunno...a King! And maybe his first royal decree will be to banish everyone who ever picked on him -- that's right, I'm looking at you, jousting team. Artie points and Lancelot and his buddies look horrified. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 43.
And Gwen... oh Gwen. I've always loved you.
Ew.
Well good friends, it breaks my heart, but, enjoy your stay here in prison while I rule the free world baby!
Alright, let's not overdo it.
I'm building my city people! On Rock and Roll!
You just overdid it. Shrek shoves the kid through the door.
Ow! Shrek, Donkey, and Puss exit the gymnasium.
All the Princesses and Fairy-tale Creatures have gathered Fiona's baby shower. A group of birds gently place a flowered wreath on Fiona's head. The Princesses all gaze her.
Oh!
Look at you!
Wow!
You look darling! Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 44.
Just precious! Look at her!
So, have you had any cravings since you've been pregnant? Fiona stands at the buffet table, stuffing her face with cakes, pies, and anything else she can get her hands on.
No, no, not at all. She takes another bite.
Do you smell ham?
Oooh! It's present time! The birds and forest creatures all flock to Snow White. T chirp and hoot happily. Snow White looks annoyed.
Oh, Fiona, won't you please open mine first? It's the one in front. Fiona reads the card.
"Congratulations on your new mess maker..." Oh, `mess maker.'
"Hopefully this helps. Love, Cinderella." Fiona opens it and pulls out a plastic baggy and pooper- scooper.
Oooo! Aaaah!
Will you look at that!
What is it? Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 45.
It's for the poopies.
Eww. Wait, babies poop?
Everyone poops Beauty. The Fairy-tale Creatures get excited.
Fiona...
Fiona! We all chipped in for a little present too.
Yah! Pinocchio spins around, revealing a "Baby-Bjorn" with Gingerbread Man inside.
Ta dah!
Oooh.
You know the baby's gonna love it because I do!
Oh, you guys, that's so sweet. Thank you. Fiona turns to another present.
Who's this one from?
I got you the biggest one because I love you the most. The other girls scowl at her.
(reading the card) "Have one on me, love Snow White" Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 46. Fiona pulls the string, opening the box to reveal a dwarf
Umm... what is it?
Ha, haaa! He's a live-in baby- sitter.
Where's the baby?
You're too kind, Snow, but I can't accept this.
Think nothing of it. I've got six more at home.
What does he do?
The cleaning.
The feeding.
The burping.
So what are Shrek and I supposed to do?
Well, now you'll have plenty of time to work on your marriage.
Gee thanks Rapunzel, and what's that supposed to mean?
Oh, come on now, Fiona. You know what happens. Cinderella prods beauty. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 47.
Huh? You're tired all the time...
You'll start letting yourself go...
Stretch marks!
Say goodbye to romance. Dragon puts her head through the window.
Yort.
Um sorry... but how many of you have kids? Doris wedges herself in on the couch.
She's right. A baby is only gonna strengthen the love that Shrek and Fiona have. How did Shrek react when you told him? Tell me! Fiona smiles.
Well, when he first found out...Shrek said-
Roarrr!
The Fairy-tale Villains are heading into town on flying broomsticks. The Evil Trees are hanging underneath some o the large broomsticks. Prince Charming is riding side sad with one of the witches.
Onward my new friends.
Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 48.
To our happily ever afters! Ha ha ha ha ha! A bug flies into his mouth.
Gaa! Gulp! Ahhhh! Prince Charming takes the bug out of his mouth.

Now, bombs away! From the sky, Prince Charming, Cyclops and the Evil Witch swoop down in "winged" formation on the broomsticks. The Evil Trees are dropped like bombs. They pull their branches (i.e. rip cord) to activate their plumage as parachutes. Prince Charming and his army dive bomb toward Rodeo Drive.
A POV shot of an Evil Witch flying over Rodeo Drive. Peop are diving out of her way. The Evil Trees land, surrounding the shoppers, who flee i terror.
Ha ha ha ha ha ha! A shadow falls over the child, and he looks up to reveal Captain Hook and the Headless Horseman on horseback.
Well, well, well. If it isn't Peter Pan.
His name's not Peter!
Shut it, Wendy!

Ahhh! Evil dwarves chase patrons from the "Ye Olde Booteria" sh They replace a few letters on a store window and turn it "Ye Olde HOOTERS." The excited patrons race back in. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 49. An Evil Knight scares the patrons of Farbucks away and th takes a seat to drink the unfinished coffee. Another Villain throws a cart through a store window. Cyclops rips the stamps off some envelopes, puts the envelopes back in the mailbox and laughs.
Ha, ha, ha, ha! The camera pans up to Prince Charming on the broomstick flying down Rodeo Drive.
Enough pillaging! To the castle! Prince Charming, on the broom, leads the Fairy-tale Villa up to the castle.

The Evil Witches surround the castle. Dragon takes down o of the witches flying by, but more Evil Witches circle he Fiona runs to the window. The Evil Witches drop a metal net over Dragon. She struggles.
sense_profile: more Evil Witches circle he Fiona runs to the window

text: Roarrrr!

BANG! The Fairy-tale Creatures run to barricade the door. The Three Pigs and Pinocchio push a dresser and other furniture in front of the door. The Fairy-tale Creatures are fortifying the room. They br themselves against the furniture.
You go and take care of the baby! The Princesses panic. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 50.
Everybody stay calm. We're all going to die! Doris slaps Snow White to calm her down.
Fiona rushes to the fireplace and pushes it to one side, revealing an underground passageway.
Everyone in! Now.
Prince Charming commands the Villains.
C'mon. Put some back into it people! The Villains use an Evil Tree as a battering ram. Cyclops rides the tree like a mechanical bull.
Yee-haw! Ow.
BOOM! The door is starting to give way.
We don't have time. Now go!
Quickly ladies! The Princesses go down the stairs.

We'll hold them off as long as we can! BOOM! There is a loud explosion and the door blows open. Prince Charming and the Fairy-tale Villains enter. He spo the Fairy-tale Creatures having a tea party. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 51.
Where are Shrek and Fiona?
Name doesn't ring a bell.
Yah!
No bell! The Fairy-tale Creatures go back to drinking their tea.
I suggest you freaks cooperate with the new King of Far Far Away.
The only thing you're ever gonna be King of is "King of the Stupids." Prince Charming snaps his fingers.
Hook!
Right! Captain Hook approaches Gingerbread Man.
Avast, ye cookie! He raises his hook under Gingerbread Man's chin.
Start talkin'! Gingerbread Man tries to hold strong, but passes out. A montage of Gingerbread Man's life flashes before his ey
A baker pulls some gingerbread cookies out of the oven. H puts on the gum drop buttons and Gingerbread Man is born.
Gingy! Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 52.
Papa!
Gingerbread Man is attending school.
Settle down, now. Gingerbread Man graduates.
Gingerbread Man is driving in his car with the top down.
Gingerbread Man is making out with his girlfriend at a mo
Gingerbread Man and his bride run down the aisle as man a wife.
Gingerbread Man is locked in a jail. Farquaad pulls off h legs.
Gingerbread Man is running on a treadmill, doing his rehabilitation.
Gingerbread Man is running through a wheat field.
Gingerbread Man is still in a dream state singing. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 53.

"On the Good Ship Lollypop, It's a sweet trip, To the candy shop, Where the Bon Bons play, On the sunny beach of Peppermint Bay.." Prince Charming becomes frustrated, he turns Pinocchio's towards him.
You! You can't lie. So tell me puppet... Where is Shrek?! Pinocchio thinks.
Well, I don't know where he's not. Prince Charming gets in Pinocchio's face.
You're telling me you don't know where Shrek is? Pinocchio is still a little nervous.
It wouldn't be inaccurate to assume that I couldn't exactly not say that is or isn't almost partially incorrect. Pinocchio thinks he has the upper hand.
So you do know where he is!
On the contrary, I'm possibly more or less, not definitely rejecting the idea, that in no way, with any amount of uncertainty that...
Stop it.
...I undeniably do or do not know where he shouldn't probably be. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 54. Captain Hook scratches his head, even the Three Little Pi are frustrated.
If that indeed wasn't where he isn't. Even if he wasn't not where I knew he was could mean that I wouldn't completely not know where he wasn't. Gingerbread Man continues to sing his "Lollipop Song."
Oh, enough! Shrek went off to bring back the next heir! Oh! The pig realizes his admission and immediately covers his mouth. Pinocchio laughs nervously.
He's bringing back the next heir?
No! Pinocchio's nose grows.
Hook! Get rid of this new "King."
Right!
But bring Shrek to me. I have something special in mind for him.
He'll never fall for your tricks! Pinocchio's nose grows again.
Oh boy.
The boat cuts through the open sea. Artie smiles as he watches Worcestershire shrinking away on the horizon. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 55.
I can't believe it... me a King? I...I mean I knew I came from royalty and all, but I just figured everyone forgot about me. He looks out to sea, disbelieving.
Oh no, in fact, the King asked for you personally. Artie smiles.
Really? Wow! Look, I know it's not all gonna be fun and games.
It really is all fun and games, actually. Sure, you have to knight a few heroes, launch a ship or two. By the way, make sure you hit the boat just right with the bottle.
Boat with the bottle? Any idiot can hit a boat with a bottle. Shrek chuckles sheepishly.
Well, I've heard it's harder than it looks.
Whoa!! This is gonna be huge. Parties, princesses, castles... princesses.
It's gonna be great, Artie. You'll be living in the lap of luxury. They got the finest chefs around waiting for you to place your order. Puss jumps up onto the railing next to Artie.
And fortunately you'll have the royal food tasters. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 56.
Oh yeah? What do they do?
They taste the food before the King eats, to make sure it's not poisoned.
Poisoned? Shrek senses trouble and immediately steps in.
Or too salty! Shrek turns to Puss and Donkey, trying to shut them up.
Don't worry about it. You'll be safe and sound with the help of your body guards.
Body guards?
All of them, willing at a moment's notice to lay down their own lives out of devotion to you.
Really?
Si, and the whole kingdom will look to you for wisdom and guidance. Behind Artie, Shrek mouths "shut-up" to Puss and Donkey.
Just make sure they don't die of famine.
Or plague.
Oh, plague is bad. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 57.
The coughing, the groaning, the festering sores. Shrek interrupts with a mock laugh.
Oh! Festering sores! Hey, you are one funny kitty cat.
What did I say?
We don't want Artie here getting the wrong idea. Shrek motions to Artie, but he's gone. They all look arou
Uh, Artie? The boat suddenly pitches to the right. Shrek braces himself. Puss and Donkey tumble away.
Whoa! Artie swings the wheel around, sending the boat back in t direction of his school. Shrek works his way into the cab and gains control of the wheel. The drunken Ship Captain slides by.
Whoa! Oh, there goes my hip.
Artie! Shrek turns the wheel the other way.
What are you doing?! The boat veers again, heading back toward Far Far Away. Artie falls to the ground and slides to the back of the b A shuffle board stick slides next to Artie. He grabs it.

What does it look like?! He jams it in the boat's wheel. The boat lurches. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 58. He swings the boat back in the other direction. Shrek ris up and grabs the wheel and turns it.
This really isn't up to you! Artie falls underneath the wheel. He stands up shoving th wheel back the other way.
But I don't know anything about being King!
You'll learn on the job! Donkey and Puss roll across the deck.
Whoaaa! Shrek grabs the wheel and swings it around. Artie yanks t wheel. They wrestle for control.
Sorry to disappoint you, but I'm going back!

Back to what? Being a loser?! As soon as the word leaves his lips, Shrek knows he's gon too far. Stung, Artie lets go of the wheel, leaving Shrek yank hard on it. He pulls the steering column from the decking.
Now look what you did!
Look what I did? Who's holding the wheel chief? Donkey climbs up onto the railing. He is seasick and is about to puke when he sees jagged rocks ahead.

Shrek! Shrek desperately sets the wheel back down and tries to s the ship clear of the rocks. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 59. The camera pans past the boat. Off-screen we hear the boa crash into the rocks.
Land ho!

Shrek, holding Puss and Donkey, staggers onto a small bea He glares at Artie who pulls himself out of the surf. Shr drops Puss and Donkey. Puss, tired of being wet, shakes himself vigorously. His puffs up into a fro. He drops his head in shame.
How humiliating...
Oh, nice going, Your Highness.
Oh, so now it's "Your highness?" What happened to "loser?" Huh?

Hey, if you think this is getting you out of anything, well it isn't. We're heading back to Far Far Away one way or another, and you're gonna be a father! Artie raises an eyebrow. Puss and Donkey stare at Shrek uncomfortably.
What?
(clearing his throat) A-hem. You just said father...
You're... I said king. You're gonna be King!
"You're gonna be King!" Yeah right. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 60. Artie shakes his head and marches down the beach toward a path into the woods.
Where do you think you're going?
Far Far Away... from you!
You get back here young man and I mean it! Artie keeps climbing.
Uh boss, I don't think he's coming back and maybe it's for the best. He is not exactly king material. Shrek looks towards Artie.
When were you planning on telling him that you were really supposed to be King?
Oh c'mon, now why would I do that? Besides, he'll be ten times better at it than me. Shrek starts off after Artie. Donkey jumps in front of Sh
Hey, woah ho ho, Shrek. Then you're gonna have to change your tactics if you want to get anywhere with this kid. Beat.
You're right, Donkey. Shrek picks up a piece of driftwood.
What about this? Donkey shakes his head in disgust. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 61.
Shrek! Shrek tosses the log.
Oh c'mon. It's just a joke.
Still... Shrek walks off, trying to catch up to Artie.
Artie marches up the mountain trail. Shrek thinks for a moment and then tries a different tact with the kid. He catches up to Artie.
Listen Artie... Artie looks back over his shoulder. He sees Shrek and jus keeps going.

If you think this whole mad scene ain't dope, I feel you dude. I mean, I'm not trying to get up in your grill or raise your roof or whatever, but what I am screaming is, yo, check out this kazing thazing bazaby. Puss and Donkey glance at each other. Artie notices a cottage in the distance and heads toward it.

I mean, if it doesn't groove or what I'm saying ain't straight trippin', just say, oh no you didn't, you know, you're gettin' on my last nerve. And then I'll know it's... then I'll know it's whack-- Passing a tree, Artie nonchalantly releases the branch, striking Shrek square in the face and takes off running. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 62.
A boiling soup pot sits over a fire in front of a small shack. Artie charges though, pounding desperately on the door.

head_text.subj: BY A MONSTER TRYING TO RELATE TO

text: Artie! Wait! Shrek, Puss, and Donkey run into the camp.
C'mon! C'mon! Help! Help! Hello? Suddenly, a burst of light shoots through a candle box th is hung on the door. A bright, colorful image of an old wizard's head is projected out. Donkey is terrified.
Greetings cosmic children of the universe, and welcome to my serenity circle! Shrek watches.
Please leave any bad vibes outside the healing vortex. And now prepare ... With a "FZZZZT" and a "BLOOP", the image disappears. The door opens and a tiny old man, Merlin, comes out.
I knew I should of gotten that warranty! Merlin smashes the security device with his little fist a is promptly zapped in the head. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 63.
AHH! Ow, ow, ow, ow, ow.
Mr. Merlin?
You know this guy?
Yeah. He was the school's magic teacher until he had his nervous breakdown.

Uh, technically I was merely a victim of a level three fatigue, and at the request of my therapist and the school authorities, I have retired to the tranquility of nature to discover my divine purpose. Merlin smacks a fly that has landed on his head. Shrek and Artie stare in astonishment.
Now, can I interest anyone in a snack or beverage?
Uh, no. Merlin offers up a baking dish full of rocks.
Sure you don't wanna try my famous rock au-gratin? Merlin takes a bite and chews loudly. His gums are bleedi from eating rocks.
It's organic! They both stare at him uncomfortably. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 64.
Oh, thanks, I just ate a boulder on the way in. What we need are directions back to Far Far Away.
What's with the "we"? Who said I was going with you?
Oh, I did. Cause there's a lot of people counting on you so don't try and weasel out of it.
If it's such a great job, why don't you do it?
Understand this kid, it's no more Mr. Nice Guy from here on out!
Oh, so that was your "Mr. Nice Guy?"
I know, and I'm gonna miss him.
You know what? Why don't you go terrorize a village and leave me alone?
Oh, is that some kind of crack about ogres? You get your royal highness to Far Far Away before I kick it there.
Now which way am I kicking?
Oh, I could tell you. But since you're in the midst of self- destructive rage spiral it would be karmic-ly irresponsible.
Self-destructive ra...
Look, are you gonna help us or not? Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 65.
Most definitely, but only after you take the journey to your soul.
Yeah, I don't think so.
Look pal, it's either that or some primal scream therapy. Ahhhhhhhhhh! Shrek grabs Merlin's mouth and closes it.
Alright, alright... journey to the soul...
A fire blazes. Merlin throws a handful of dirt into the fire, it flares.

Now all of you, look into the "Fire of Truth" and tell me what you see! Yah! Ha! (Wild war cry) Woo-looo-looo-looo! He points at the smoke and it starts to form objects (i.e Rorschach inkblots). Puss and Donkey, excited, sit by the fire.
Ooo! Charades! Okay, I see a dutch fudge torte with cinnamon swirls.
Okay. Monster, go for it. Shrek glances at the fire. The stroller from his nightmar begins to take shape in the smoke. He blows the image awa He covers his fear and changes the subject.
I see a rainbow pony. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 66.
Excellent work!
Now! The boy!
This is lame. Merlin whacks Artie on the back of the head.
Ow!
You're lame! Now just go for it. He tosses more dirt and flames burst up. Artie studies it
Okay. There's a baby bird and a father bird sitting in a nest. Merlin starts beating a drum. Artie's expression starts t change as he stays focused.
Yes! Stay with it! Stay with it!
Wait, the dad just flew away. Why did he leave the little bird all alone? Shrek starts to take this in as he watches. Artie gets mo worked up.
It's trying to fly, but it doesn't know how to. It.. it's gonna fall! Suddenly, Artie catches what he said. As the smoke drifts away, he looks and sees everyone else staring back at him stunned.
Whew, proper head case you are, aren't you? Really messed up. Whoa. Merlin goes back inside. They all stare at Artie. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 67.
Yeah, yeah, okay. I get it. The bird's me. My dad left. So what? Donkey gives Shrek a nudge to go over and talk to Artie. Shrek hesitates and Donkey insists.

Look Artie...um- Just as he's about to get going, "That's What Friends Are For" starts playing loudly from Merlin's security device drowning out any conversation. They all turn toward the shack where Merlin peeks out.
(loud, over the music) Just thought I might help set the mood! Y'know for your big heart to heart chat! Everyone stares at him. He sheepishly turns off the device and shuts the door. It quiet again.
I know what it's like to not feel ready for something. Artie looks at him.
Even ogres get scared...you know, once in a while.
I know you want me to be king, but I can't. I'm not cut out for it and I never will be, alright? Shrek takes this in.
Even my own dad knew I wasn't worth the trouble. He dumped me at that school the first chance he got and I never heard from him again. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 68.
My dad wasn't really the fatherly type either.
Well, I doubt he was worse than mine.
Oh yeah? My father was an ogre. He tried to eat me. Artie looks at Shrek.
Now, I guess I should have seen it coming. He used to give me a bath in barbecue sauce and put me to bed with an apple in my mouth. Artie chuckles at this.
Okay... I guess that's... pretty bad. Artie laughs and then pokes at the fire.
You know, it may be hard to believe what with my obvious charm and good looks, but people used to think that I was a monster. And for a long time, I believed them. Artie looks up at Shrek.
But after awhile, you learn to ignore the names that people call you and you just trust who you are. Artie gently pokes at the embers with a stick for a momen
You know, you're okay, Shrek. He tosses the stick into the fire.
You just need to do a little less yelling and use a little more soap. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 69.
Thanks Artie.
The soap's because you stink. Really bad.
Yeah. I got that. The camera slowly booms up and away from the group as the fire continues to burn.

The Princesses, Fiona and the Queen are surrounded by darkness as they tiptoe down the steps and into the catac below the castle. They round a corner and step onto a ledge with Fiona lead the way, holding a torch.
sense_profile: down the steps and into the catac below the castle

text: Oh this place is filthy. I feel like a hobo. Fiona tries to keep her frustration in check.
I'm sorry but this just isn't working for me. Sleeping Beauty, still being carried by Doris, wakes up.
Everything's always about you, isn't it? It's not like your attitude is helping, Snow.
Well maybe it just bothers you that I was voted fairest in the land.
You mean in that rigged election?
Oh, give me a break. (gesturing toward hair)
Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 70. SNOW WHITE (cont'd) "Rapunzel, Rapunzel, let down thy golden extensions!"
Ladies, let go of your petty complaints and let's work together. Snow White and Rapunzel share an indignant look. Fiona travels deeper into the catacombs. The other Princesses follow.
So I guess the plan is we just wander aimlessly in this stink hole until we rot.
No, we're gonna get inside and find out what Charming's up to.
I know he's a jerk and everything, but I gotta admit, that Charming makes me hotter than July.
Ew!
Ugh. Finally, Fiona spots what she was looking for.
That's it! Fiona, the Queen and the Princesses run towards a long la and climb up through a grate into the main castle courtya

They peer around a corner and see the construction of an outdoor theater is underway. Two stagehands walk by carry a large dragon set piece. Evil dwarves are busy painting set. The finishing touches are put on the stage tower. The Princesses hug the wall as a group of guards march by Rapunzel takes off in the other direction, and signals th Princesses to follow her. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 71.
sense_profile: the construction of an outdoor theater

text: Come on, this way!
Rapunzel. Wait! Fiona and the Princesses race after Rapunzel. They spot h sprinting into the castle and follow her. They burst thro the doors and see Prince Charming holding Rapunzel by the arm.
Charming, let go of her. A large group of armed Far Far Away Guards surround them. Prince Charming smiles at Fiona.
But why would I want to do that?
Grrrr!
Woof! He looks back at Rapunzel lovingly, and the two share a l kiss. Fiona and the other Princesses are shocked.
What?
Say hello ladies, to the new Queen of Far Far Away. Cinderella claps excitedly.
Yaaaaaaaaay! The Princesses stare her down.
Rapunzel, how could you?
Jealous much? Prince Charming eyes up the Princesses. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 72.
Soon you'll be back where you started... scrubbing floors or locked away in towers; that is, if I let you last the week.
But Pooky, you promised you wouldn't hurt them!
Not here, "kitten whiskers." Daddy will discuss it later. Now forgive us, we have a show to put on.
Shrek will be back soon Charming, and you'll be sorry. He stops and flashes a sadistic smile.

Sorry? Don't you realize --once Shrek sets foot in Far Far Away he's doomed? Prince Charming leads Rapunzel out. She looks back at the apologetically. Everyone wears a look of defeat. The guards march them off. Fiona and the princesses are locked away in a prison cell Fiona looks through the bars of the cell, feeling helples

location: WOODS OUTSIDE OF FAR FAR AWAY

text: Shrek startles awake. He sits up and scratches his head, looking around. He realizes it's morning. Behind him a peaceful bird lands on a tree branch. Sudden the tree branch that was holding the bird flicks it off. Shrek senses the movement behind him and turns around to everything is normal. He turns back around to wake up everyone. The trees start to advance toward Shrek. The log Artie is sleeping on suddenly sits up, knocking Artie, who is still asleep, to the ground. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 73.
Ow! The tree turns around to reveal an Evil Tree. Donkey fina wakes up.

Ahhh! The Evil Trees continue to advance. A piano is heard. The trees part and Hook is revealed to be playing the piano. The music builds to a dramatic finale. Captain Hook turns away from his keys and faces them.
Look out! They've got a piano!
Kill `em all. Except the fat one. He stares hard at Shrek and aims his hooked prosthetic.
King Charming has something special in mind for you, ogre. Shrek is perplexed.
"King Charming?"
Attack! Pirates charge forward, swinging in from the tree branche
One lands and gets his peg-leg stuck in the ground. The pirates close in. Shrek grabs one and throws him to t side. One pirate raises his sword and prepares to swing at Arti
sense_profile: his peg - leg stuck in the ground

text: Artie, Duck! Shrek pushes Artie's head down and the sword narrowly mis him. The pirate prepares to swing again and Shrek lifts Artie above his head. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 74. Still in the air, Artie uses both legs to kick the pirate the ground. Shrek and Artie share a satisfied look. A pirate charges Donkey.
Ahhh! Puss draws his sword and begins fighting off the pirate, protecting Donkey.
Ha-ha! Argh!

Argh! Argh! The camera pans across the back of the piano to reveal Me happily playing along with Captain Hook. He notices and rudely elbows Merlin out of the way. A pirate runs at Shrek, only to be tripped by Artie. The pirate bounces off Shrek's belly.

Ready the plank! A wooden board is thrown on a stump, creating a makeshift "plank." The pirates back Shrek onto the plank. Several pirates with swords force Shrek onto the plank. H is backed up to the edge of the plank and falls into a waiting treasure chest below. Several pirates try to shut lid on him. Puss, Donkey and Artie are trying to hold off the Villain Suddenly, two Evil Trees come into frame and scoop Puss, Donkey and Artie up in a net. The pirates aim the cannon at Puss, Donkey and Artie. Art starts to panic. Puss extracts his claws and tries to cut through the netting. The cannon fuse is lit. Shrek bursts open the treasure chest and stands up with t chest still stuck to his behind.
Shrek!

Help! Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 75. Shrek sees the lit fuse and quickly formulates a plan. He grabs two pirates and shoves them into the treasure chest He tosses the chest onto the other end of the plank and catapults himself over to the cannon. At the last second, Shrek is able to aim the cannon in the opposite direction The cannon fires and hits Captain Hook's piano, blowing i into pieces. Realizing their defeat, the Evil Trees drop the netting t holds Donkey, Puss and Artie. The Evil Trees and Pirates take off running. Captain Hook turns and sees his army running off. He shak his hook in the air.
Ya cowards!
What has Charming done with Fiona?
She's gonna get what's coming to her. He raises his hook threateningly but it gets caught on an Evil Tree's branch and is dragged away with the rest of t Villains.
Ahhh.
And there ain't nothing you can do to stop him! TIGHT ON SHREK, filled with worry. Nothing else matters t him now. Artie, Puss, and Donkey run over to Shrek.
We've got to save her!
But she's so far far away! Shrek thinks for a moment.
Get yourself back to Worcestershire, kid. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 76.
No, Shrek. Hold on a second. I've got an idea.
Merlin is sitting cross-legged, deep in meditation. Artie approaches him.
I'm a buzzing bee, buzz, buzz, buzz...
Mr. Merlin, they need a spell to get them...I mean, us, back to Far Far Away. Merlin stops meditating and looks out of the corner of hi eye at Artie.
Forget it. I don't have that kind of magic in me anymore, kid. How about a hug instead? Hmm? That's the best kind of magic. Artie tries a new approach.
Mr. Merlin please. I know you can
I said, forget it!
Merlin turns and starts to walk away muttering under his breath.
Mumble, grumble, interrupt my healing. Mumble, mumble. Artie thinks for a moment, staring at Merlin. Artie start to sob. Merlin stops and turns around. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 77.
Oh. What, what's with you? Artie continues to cry.
It's just so hard. You know? They really need to get back `cause their kingdom's in trouble `cause there's a really bad man and it's just so hard... Merlin is visibly uncomfortable.
C'mon, take it easy. Artie's blubbering becomes frustrated and unpredictable.
No! I don't think you understand! There's a mean person doing mean things to good people-
Oh, have a heart old man! Artie grabs him, now desperate.
And they really need your help to get them back! So why won't you help them?
Oh. Artie speaks one last, indecipherable line. Merlin is stunned. He doesn't know what to do.
Uh, Okay... I'll go and get my things. Merlin goes into his cave. Artie immediately recovers. Shrek is impressed.
Piece of cake. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 78.
Well, well, well. You want some eggs with that ham? Shrek smiles. Merlin returns holding a spell book.
Now, I am a little rusty, so there could be some side effects.
Side effects!?

Don't worry, whatever it is, no matter how excruciatingly painful it may be, it'll wear off eventually... I think. Merlin cracks his knuckles. A bolt of lighting shoots out his hands and blows up a rock next to Donkey.
Ah!
Oops. Donkey and Puss shoot Shrek a pleading look.
Are you sure this is a good idea?
Look, if Artie trusts him, that's good enough for me. Even if his robe doesn't quite cover his-
Alacraticious expeditious, a zoomy zoom zoom. Let's help our friends get back, um... soon! Magic rays shoot out of Merlin's fingers. Shrek, Puss, Donkey and Artie disappear in a puff of smoke.
Woah! It worked!
Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 79.
They reappear and fall out of the sky and bounce through canopy of a large apple tree. They ping-pong through the foliage and land in a heap at the base of the tree.
(moan and groan) Donkey adjusts himself, feeling hung over.
(in Puss' body) Oh man, I haven't been on a trip like that since college.
Donkey?
(in Puss' body) What? Is there something in my teeth? Donkey's eyes widen. He realizes his voice is coming out Puss' body.
(in Puss' body) Huh? What the?
Oh no! Donkey (in Puss' body) grabs Puss' hat. He looks down at Puss' boots. His tail begins to twitch.
(in Puss' body) I've been abracadabra'd into a fancy feasting second rate sidekick. Puss (in Donkey's body) falls from a tree next to Donkey Puss' body).
(in Donkey's body) At least you don't look like some kind of bloated roadside pinata. You really should think about going on a diet! Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 80.

(in Puss' body) Yeah, and you should think about getting yourself a pair of pants! I feel all exposed and nasty. Both Shrek and Artie stare at them. A strained smile past to their faces. They burst out laughing. Donkey joins Puss, both of them scowling.
(in Puss' body) Oh, so you two think this is funny? Puss is fuming. Shrek and Artie regain their composure.
I'm really sorry guys.
Don't be! You got us back kid. Shrek motions to Far Far Away, just a few miles ahead of them. He turns back to Artie. Artie smiles. Donkey takes a few awkward steps in Puss' body.
(in Puss' body) Ow, ow, ow, ow, ow. How in the Hans Christian Andersen am I supposed to parade around in these goofy boots?
Be very careful with those - HEE
Puss is shocked by this. He tries to recover.
They were made in Madrid by the finest- HEE HAW! Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 81.
(in Puss' body) Oh, you'll learn to control that.

Shrek, Puss (in Donkey's body), and Artie rush past a wel sign to the town that has been boarded over so it now rea "Go Go Away." Donkey (in Puss' body) struggles to walk. His tender new feet hurt in their tiny boots.

Seriously man, you need some comfort inserts or arch supports or something. (noticing Rodeo Drive) Woah! Inside the kingdom, Rodeo Drive is trashed. There is graf everywhere. Suddenly a carriage driven by Evil Witches comes zooming Rodeo Drive.
Woohoo!! The carriage zips around a corner on two wheels. A drunke Evil Dwarf is almost hit by the carriage while crossing t street. Shrek is shocked by what he sees. A crash is heard off-screen.

Hey... watch it I'm walking here... and I'm gonna keep going... A large explosion is heard off-screen while Little Red Ri Hood pick pockets the Evil Dwarf. A carriage wheel on fire rolls by a marionette theatre wi Pinocchio dancing in it.
Pinocchio? Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 82.
Shrek! Shrek and the rest rush over as the curtain starts to go on Pinocchio. He presses his puppet hands against the gla
Pinocchio!
Help me!
What's happened?
Charming and the Villains have taken over everything! They attacked us but Fiona and the Princesses got away. And now she's-
The time has run out. The cheesy music stops as the curta goes down.
She's what?! She's what!? Shrek looks at the marionette theatre and sees how much i costs per show.
(turns to Puss in Donkey's
Puss, loan me five bucks!
C'mon Puss, you heard the man, help a brother out.
(in Donkey's body) Do you see any pockets on me?
(in Puss' body) Hold on a second. Donkey (in Puss' body) removes his boot, he turns it over a bag of money falls onto the ground. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 83.
(in Puss' body) Aha! Donkey (in Puss' body) tosses the money to Shrek.
(in Donkey's body) I had no idea ...really ...I swear. Shrek quickly dumps the change into the machine. The musi starts and the curtain goes up again and Pinocchio dances
Quick, Pinocchio. Where is Fiona?
Charming's got her locked away some place secret. You gotta find him! He's probably getting ready for the
The curtain goes down again.
Wait, wait, wait! Pinocchio! What show? Pinocchio's hand comes out from under the curtain and poi to a poster on the wall. Puss reads the poster out loud.
(reading the poster) It's A Happily Ever After, After All!
Shrek's final performance. The picture shows Charming, sword raised in the air, with foot pinning Shrek, tongue sticking out of his mouth, to ground.
(in Puss' body) Whoa, Shrek! You didn't tell us you were in a play.
Well I guess I've been so busy I forgot to mention it! Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 84.
It's the ogre! Get him! Shrek turns and sees a large group of Charming's royal knights, armed and ready. They drive them back into the alley. Puss (in Donkey's body) steps forward.

(in Donkey's body) Don't worry, Jefe. I got this. He whips his head towards the oncoming guards. His eyes a large and sweet. His lips pout. The guards are momentaril hypnotized by his cuteness, until they realize they're staring at a donkey. The guards recoil.
Ugh! Kill it! Puss (in Donkey's body) immediately retreats. Artie glances at the theater poster on the wall and steps forward, confronting the guards.
Look, don't you know who he thinks he is? How dare you? Shrek picks up on his plan.
Donkey, we're dealing with amateurs. The guards are confused. Artie tears the poster off the wall. Shrek glances at Artie, who steps forward, yanking poster off the wall.
He's a star people! Hello?! I'm so sorry about this Mr. Shrek.
I'm gonna lose it!
I assume you have everything ready for tonight! You did get the list for the dressing room? Donkey marches in. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 85.

(in Puss' body) Yeah, the breakfast croissants stuffed with seared sashimi tuna. Oh, and please tell me you at least have the saffron corn with the jalapeno honey butter cause our client cannot get into his proper emotional state without his jalapeno honey butter.
I just lost it!
Uh...Maybe they should talk to Nancy in Human Resources. Shrek pushes the guards aside and continues on towards th castle.
(in Donkey's body) Oh, we'll have much to say to Nancy, I promise! The guards look at each other nervously.

A group of enchanted trees work on through their dance number. Two dwarfs on bungee chords helplessly swing back and for in the rear of the stage. The camera lands on Prince Charming reading his lines nex a Shrek stand in.
(reading his lines from a
With this sword, I do- No. He starts the line over.
With this sword, I do smote thee! Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 86. Without looking, Prince Charming stabs the stand in, who falls to the ground.
Is that the right word? "Smote?" "Smooote." Is that even a word actually? Maybe I should just smite him. Unseen stage hands drag the stand-in away.
Let's try this again. Now... Stagehands shove another stand in onto the stage beside Prince Charming.
(playing the scene out
Shrek attacks me, I pretend to be afraid. (he fake screams) Ooh!!! Prince Charming does a quick mime of being afraid and chuckles.

I say... (he riffles through pages) "Finally the Kingdom will get the happily ever after they deserve, die Ogre", blah, blah, blah... Without looking he stabs stand in #2. He falls to the gro Prince Charming is still frustrated.
Oh! It just doesn't feel real enough yet! He throws the sword to the ground and turns toward the dancing villains who are staring at him.
Who told you to stop dancing?!
Uh... Wink and turn, wink and turn. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 87. He throws the script on the ground and notices the stand-
