And what are you laying around for? Get up! Honestly. Prince Charming storms off.

Prince Charming storms into his colossal gold leafed dres room, its walls covered with posters of inspirational say and portraits of Prince Charming in different acting role Slamming the door, he plops down in his throne chair in f of a dressing table and large 3-way mirror. A statuette o his mother is on the vanity. He looks at it intently.

Our happily ever after is nearly complete, mummy. And I assure you, the people of this kingdom will pay dearly for every second we've had to wait. Charming adjusts the mirror, revealing a reflection of Sh standing in the doorway. Artie, Puss and Donkey stand alo side him. Prince Charming quickly stands up and faces Shrek.

Break a leg. Or, on second thought, let me break it for you. He walks across the room as Prince Charming backs against dressing table. Prince Charming fumbles behind his back and pushes a butt under the counter.
Thank goodness you're here. I was beginning to think you might not make it back in... time. Shrek picks him up by the front of his shirt and scowls. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 88.
Where's Fiona?
Don't worry. She and the others are safe. For now. Shrek strengthens his grip. Suddenly, a group of guards burst into the room and quick surround Shrek, Artie, Puss and Donkey.

Ow. Prince Charming smiles. Shrek looks around and realizes he's beat. He drops Charm with a thud. Prince Charming brushes himself off as the guards surroun Shrek. Prince Charming walks over to Artie. A smile grows across his face.
Let me guess... Arthur? Artie looks indignant. He raises himself up.
It's Artie, actually.
This boy is supposed to be the new King of Far Far Away? Laughing, Prince Charming draws his sword and holds it up Artie's neck.
How pathetic! Now, stand still so I won't make a mess. Shrek steps in.
Charming, stop! I'm here now, you got what you wanted. This isn't about him. Artie is confused. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 89.
Then who's it about? I'm supposed to be King, right? Shrek hesitates and then gathers himself.
You weren't really next in line for the throne, okay? I was.
But you said the King asked for me personally.
Not exactly.
What's that supposed to mean? Shrek becomes defensive.
Look, I said whatever I had to say, alright! I wasn't right for the job, I just needed some fool to replace me, and you fit the bill. So just go! Artie is stunned.
You were playing me the whole time. Shrek fights back tears as he punishes Artie more.
You catch on real fast kid... Maybe you're not as big of a loser as I thought. Puss (in Donkey's body) is about to interject when Donkey Puss' body) covers his mouth and signals him to stay quie
You know, for a minute there, I actually thought you -

What? That he cared about you? He's an ogre. What did you expect? Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 90. Prince Charming signals the guards to release Artie. He stares at Shrek one last time and heads out. Shrek lowers his head in shame.
You really do have a way with children, Shrek. Prince Charming smiles and the guards lead Shrek off.
Shrek is led by the guards down the hallway.
The scene cross-dissolves to Artie's back as he walks awa from the castle. He gives one last look back, and angrily storms away.
Shrek's ankles and wrists are shackled. Shrek pulls on hi chains. He sadly looks out the cell window.
The scene cross-disolves to another prison window. Fiona comes to the window of her prison cell. She stares sorrowfully at the castle in the distance.
sense_profile: to the window of her prison cell

text: All of the Princesses, the Queen and Fiona are locked up the same prison cell. Cinderella is frantically scrubbing a spot on the floor t shine. Fiona looks out the cell window towards the castle in the distance. Behind her, Snow White paces around, complainin
Had we just stayed put like I suggested, we could be sipping tea out of little heart-shaped cups... Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 91.
Yeah... yeah, heart shaped cups.
Eating crumpets smothered with loganberries.
Yeah... loganberries.
Shut up Cindy.
Yeah, shut up. Cinderella looks down at her reflection in the floor.
No! You shut up!
Just stay out of this!
Who cares who's running the kingdom anyway?
I care. Fiona steps forward and challenges them.
And you should all care too. Suddenly, the cell door flies open. Donkey and Puss (in e other's bodies) are tossed in as the door is slammed behi them.
(in Donkey's body) Hey, hey, hey, hey.
(in Puss' body) Yeah, and I have your badge number,
Puss, in Donkey's body, hisses and arches his back like a cat. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 92.
Donkey?!
(in Puss' body) Princess?!
Puss?!
(in Donkey's body) Lo siento, Princessa, but I am Puss, stuck here inside this hideous body.
(in Puss' body) And I'm me!

(in Puss' body) I know, I know. Everything's a little fruity in the loops right now. But what happened is, we went to high school, the boat crashed, and we got "bippity-bopity-booped" by the "Magic Man."
You poor sweet things.
I don't get it.
The cat turned into a little horse that smells like feet. What's to get?
Huh? Who dat?
Where's Shrek? Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 93.
Charming's got him, Princess. And he plans on killing Shrek tonight in front of the whole kingdom. Fiona's lets out a breath.
Alright everyone, we need to find a way out, now. The Princesses nod in agreement.

You're right. (to the other Princesses) Ladies, assume the position! Sleeping Beauty falls asleep standing up. Snow White quic assumes her position by lying down and puckering her lips Cinderella dusts off a spot, sits down and crosses her le
What are you doing?
Waiting to be rescued.
You have got to be kidding me.
Well, what do you expect us to do? We're just four...
I mean, three, super hot princesses, two circus freaks, a pregnant ogre and an old lady. The Queen smiles and then casually walks by the Princesse
Hmmm. Excuse me. Old lady coming through. She walks right up to the brick wall, takes a deep breath lets out a yell.
Hiiiyyyiiiaaaah! She head-butts a hole right through the brick wall. Fiona and the Princesses are impressed. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 94.
Whoa.
Mom!?
Well, you didn't actually think you got your fighting skills from your father, did you? Fiona beams at her mother and then turns to the Princesse Snow White points to another wall behind them.
Excuse me, I think there's still one more. The Queen turns and sees the another wall barring their w
Hmmmm. The Queen hurries to the other wall.
Hiiiiyah! It crumbles, revealing the outside. The princesses wince. Fiona approaches her mother. The Queen turns around, this time a little woozy, singing softly to herself.
Why don't you just lie down? The Queen continues to sing to herself as she walks away. Fiona turns to the others.

Okay girls, from here on out, we're gonna take care of business ourselves. Snow thinks for a moment and then glances at the other Princesses. They nod. Snow looks determined. She rips off a sleeve, revealing a Dopey tattoo. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 95. Sleeping Beauty tears the bottom of her dress. The Queen puts lipstick smudges under her eyes (a la a football player). Cinderella sharpens the heal of her glass slipper. Doris burns her bra. The Princesses place their hands over Fiona's. Puss and Donkey's hands come in last.
Captain Hook replaces his "hook" appendage with a "baton" taps it on the score in front of him.
sense_profile: on the score in front of him

text: Ladies and gentlemen. The Far Far Away Theatre at the Charming Pavilion is proud to present: "It's a Happily Ever After, After All." The camera pulls back from a playbill that reads: "It's a Happily Ever After, After All - Starring Prince Charming himself." Two intimidating Evil Knights are handing out the playbil and are using spears to usher people into their seats.
Enjoy your evening of theatrical reverie, citizen! Oy! No food or beverages in the theatre! Hey! The orchestra begins to warm up.
The camera follows Rumplestiltskin as he hurries from the stage to backstage.

SHREK stands atop a wooden platform, like a beaten man. Cyclops is binding his arms and legs with heavy chains attached to the floor. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 96. He pulls the chains tight.
Oww, easy.
Sorry. I guess I was just showing off for the little one.
Huh?
It's "Bring your kids to work day." C'mere beautiful. Cyclops motions to the shadows. CYCLOPS' DAUGHTER walks out from the shadows. She looks l Cyclops with long hair and skirt. Shrek recoils.
Well... she's got your eye. Cyclops picks her up and embraces her.
Who woulda thought a monster like me deserves something as special as you? They touch foreheads affectionately. Shrek looks at the two of them and then gets a determined look on his face.

The camera booms down into some trees just outside of the castle. Fiona and the Princesses appear behind a log. Two Evil Trees guard the castle gate. Fiona uses a duck call signal Snow White. She skips down the path toward a side entrance, where two Evil Trees are standing guard. Snow White stops in front of them, singing our version of: "An Friends/With A Smile." Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 97.
sense_profile: down the path toward a side entrance , where two Evil Trees are standing guard

text: "Ahh ha ha ha ha haa." The birds answer her in song.
"Ahh ha ha ha haa." The birds answer again.
"Ha ha ha ha haaaa. Little birdies take wing, flitting down from the trees they appear, and to chirp in my ear." All the forest creatures flock to her.
"All because I sing. Ahh ha ha ha ha haaa." More forest creatures flock to Snow White.
"Ahh ha ha ha ha haaa." The Evil Trees stare in amazement.
"Ha ha ha ha ha haaaaaaa!" Suddenly Snow White's face changes. She transitions into Zeppelin's "Immigrant Song."
Ahhaha!! Ahhaha!!! All the animals turn and attack the trees. Fiona and the Princesses charge forward.
Move it! Go! Go! Go!
Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 98.
Donkey and Puss (in each other's bodies) run through fron gates of the Far Far Away Zoo. The Dronkeys are held captive in the zoo. Donkey (in Puss body) busts open their cage.
(in Puss' body) My babies! The Dronkeys fly over to Puss (in Donkey's body) and hug
(in Donkey's body) Help! Ow!
(in Puss' body) Hey!

The Princesses run toward the castle. Doris punches throu the lock to open the gates. As they enter the castle grounds, a group of guards runs towards them. Cinderella takes out a couple of them with boomerang crystal slipper. Sleeping Beauty falls to the ground, asleep. The guards trip over her body. Doris runs up to the foot of a canopy and takes a knee. T Princesses use Doris as a step to leap onto the canopy an over the castle wall.
sense_profile: to leap onto the canopy an over the castle wall

text: Donkey and Puss (in each other's bodies) break Pinocchio of his marionette theatre.
Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 99.

Gingerbread Man is locked inside a bakery display case. Donkey and Puss arrive (in each other's bodies). Donkey ( Puss' body) awkwardly tries to cut the glass open with hi claws. Puss (in Donkey's body) intervenes, quickly bashin hoof through the glass. They pull Gingerbread Man out of case.
sense_profile: to cut the glass open with hi claws
the glass open with hi claws

text: Fiona leads the Princesses and Queen, as they stealthily creep along the rooftop.

Fiona peers around a corner and sees two guards blocking their path. She gets an idea. The Guards turn around to find a leg sticking out. They "ooh" and "aah" as they approach the leg. The camera pans to reveal Doris.
Hey. How's it going? She kicks the guards to the ground, and they take off running.

head_text.subj: EXT. FAR, FAR AWAY CASTLE- LATER

text: Donkey, Puss, (still in each other's bodies) and the resc Fairy Tale Creatures run toward the castle. Donkey and Puss peek out from behind a bush.
(in Donkey's body) "O" to the "K." The coast has cleared. Donkey turns to address the Fairy Tale Creatures behind h Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 100.
(in Puss' body) All right people, let's do this thing! Go Team Dy-No-Mite!!
I thought we agreed we would go by the name of "Team Super Cool."
As I recall it was "Team Awesome."
I voted for "Team Alpha Wolf Squadron."
Alright! Alright! Alright! From henceforth we are to be known as "Team Alpha Super Awesome Cool Dynomite Wolf Squadron." The Three Pigs notice something.
Ach to Lieber! There is some strange little girl over there staring at us! Donkey, in Puss' body, turns to look. Artie is staring at the strange crew.
(in Puss' body) Artie! Artie turns and walks away. Puss, in Donkey's body, runs stop him.
(in Donkey's body) Wait, wait, wait, wait wait. Hey! Where is the fire, Senor? Artie pushes Puss (in Donkey's body) out of the way.
Oh please, don't act so innocent. You both knew what was going on the whole time and you kept it to yourself. Artie starts to storm away. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 101.
(in Puss' body) Artie, it's not like it seems.
It's not? I think it seems pretty clear. He was using me. That's all there is to it. Artie starts to walk off.
(in Puss' body) Using you? Man, you really don't get it!
(in Donkey's body) Shrek only said those things to protect you! This stops Artie in his tracks.
(in Puss' body) Charming was going to kill you Artie. Shrek saved your life. Artie realizes the truth and is suddenly concerned for hi friend.
The lights dim. The curtain rises.
Rumplestiltskin orders for the spotlight.
Cue the spot!
A spotlight comes up on Rapunzel, singing in a tower whil the Fairy-tale Villains play their roles below. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 102.

"I wait alone up here. I'm trapped another day. Locked up here - please set me free. My new life I almost see, A castle, you and me. Yes, a castle you and me..." Audience members look at each other in confusion; is this crap for real? Raul, the make-up artist, cries in the audience. From the audience a knight holds up a candle. Up in the rafters, Rumplestiltskin cues the Cherubs.

Cherubs! The Cherubs (Evil Dwarves) are lowered onto the stage by rope and pulley system. A spotlight appears on stage. From underneath the stage a clamshell rises and opens to reveal Prince Charming on horseback.

"Tis I! Tis I! Upon my regal steed! Princess, my love, at last you shall be freed!" The Cherubs drop rose petals onto Prince Charming and the clamshell. Prince Charming and his steed, Chauncey, jump of the clamshell.
"I'm strong and brave, and dashing my way there! With speed! With might! With soft and bouncy hair!" Prince Charming begins to make his way over to the tower.
"Through the blistering desert..." Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 103. Prince Charming chops the head off of the flying griffin puppet.
"Hot!" Prince Charming dismounts, casually chops the head off of sea serpent and crosses the sea.
"Across the stormiest sea."
"Wet!" He makes his way to dry land. He weaves in and out of the Evil Trees, who are playing the part of a forest.
"Facing creatures so vile!"
"Foul!" He casually cuts off the head of a wooden cut-out reindee and shoves a villain in a bear costume out of the way.
"So you can gaze upon me!" Prince Charming has made his way up the stairs at the bot of Rapunzel's tower.
"I knew you'd come for me. And now we finally meet."

"I knew you'd wait. And from my plate of love you'd eat." Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 104. There is a loud flash and a loud growling is piped throug the sound system and flares go off as a trap door opens i the stage floor. Prince Charming hams it up for the audience, putting his hand to his ear.
Rumplestiltskin cues Mabel. Mabel is growling through a megaphone backstage.
Roar! Roar! Three Evil Witches turn a lever and an Evil Dwarf blows s steam with a billow.
A large, imposing shadow grows onstage. The silhouette fades, revealing a shackled Shrek on stage. He pulls at h chains as he notes the audience and views the spectacle before him.
A crowd of fans, with "SHREK" written on their stomachs, cheer. One of the fans is hit with an arrow. They promptl sit down.
"Who is this terrible ugly fiend who so rudely intervened?" Pirates and Evil Knights dance in from the wings.
"Will Charming fight? Or will he flee?"
"Oh please, rescue me!"
"From this monstrosity!" Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 105. Prince Charming takes a dramatic pause and sings in an ul high voice of a castrato.
"Fear thee not Honey Lamb! I will slice this thing up like a
Oh boy. Prince Charming relishes the moment, pulling out his swor and aiming it at Shrek's chest. Prince Charming's voice climbs even higher.
You are about to enter a world of pain with which you are

"FamiliaAAAAAAR!" He holds the last, highest note. Shrek winces. Goblets, e glasses, a glass tiara and glass pearls all break in the audience. Prince Charming smiles. Shrek looks at him with contempt.

Well it can't be anymore painful than the lousy performance you're giving. The audience laughs at Shrek's remark. Prince Charming is thrown by their reaction. From a trap door underneath the stage Rumplestiltskin tri to help Prince Charming out by feeding him his next line.
"Prepare foul beast." He clears his throat and tries to get back into character
"Prepare foul beast, your time is done."
Oooh, if you don't mind could you kill me, and then sing? Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 106. The audience laughs. Prince Charming gets in Shrek's face
Be quiet!
Oh, come on, I'm just havin' fun with ya. That's actually a very nice leotard.
Thank you.
Do they come in men's sizes? The audience laughs again.
He, he. Now that be funny. The crowd laughs again. Shrek smiles, enjoying how he's screwing up the show. Prince Charming is furious.
The crowd falls silent. Prince Charming turns back to Shrek.
Now you'll finally know what it's like to have everything you've worked for, everything that's precious to you taken away. Prince Charming raises his sword.
Now you'll know how I felt. Suddenly a fireball hits the blade, melting it.
Ahhhhh! Another huge fireball spreads across the sky as Dragon fl above the theater. The Dronkeys follow behind her.
Roar! Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 107. The Three Pigs come running down the aisle.

Sausage Roll!! The Three Pigs leap onto the stage, going into a drop and roll move to land in between Shrek and Prince Charming. T strike a fighting pose. Pinocchio comes flying in on his strings, landing with a flurry of kung-fu hands. The Wolf unzips the wolf costume, steps out and joins the others.

Arg. Gingerbread Man pops up in the tower window, grabs Rapunz hair and swings down. Before he hits the ground, the end catches and he bounces like a bungee jumper. Her hair fal into a pile next to a very surprised Gingerbread Man. Rapunzel screams. Her mousy brown hair crammed under a ha net. She runs off crying. Prince Charming looks around, almost surrounded. Suddenly a shadow falls over the crowd and they gasp. Dra and the Dronkeys fly in and land on the stage. Puss and Donkey leap off her back to the stage.
(in Puss's body) Pray for mercy from...
(in Donkey's body) ...Puss! He claps his hooves on the stage.
(in Puss' body) And Donkey! He carves a letter "D" on Pinocchio's bottom.

(re: his bottom) Hey. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 108. The Queen head-butts through one of the backdrops, with Sleeping Beauty and Doris. Snow White flies in behind the with the help of her woodland creatures ("Crouching Tiger Hidden Dragon" style). Cinderella runs on stage equipped a mop as her weapon. Together, the Princesses strike fier poses and stand next to Shrek. The audience applauds. Suddenly the front door of the "swamp house" set crashes the floor, revealing Fiona.
Hi honey! Sorry we're late. You okay?
Much better, now that you're here.
Awwwwwww! The audience applauds. Shrek turns to Prince Charming raising his shackled wrists.
So Charming, you wanna let me out of these so we can settle this ogre to man? Prince Charming considers this for a second.

Oooh, that sounds fun. But I have a better idea! Prince Charming strikes an imperious pose and claps his hands. Cyclops suddenly emerges from the trap door, knock Puss and Donkey down. He approaches them menacingly. The witches fly in and threaten the princesses with their brooms. The Evil Queen rises up behind the Queen and puts knife to her throat. The Evil Dwarves grab The Three Pigs. Gingerbread Man is suddenly surrounded by many Evil Knights. He poops out a ball. Dragon starts to move forward only to find herself surrou by crossbows. A bunch of pirates grab Fiona and tie her u
Fiona! Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 109.
No! Let go of me! Shrek struggles to free himself of the chains, but it's n use. Prince Charming's eyes narrow.
You will not ruin things this time ogre.
Kill it! Prince Charming signals to the villains to attack Shrek. the villains advance towards Shrek, a spotlight shines in their eyes, stopping them in their tracks.
Everybody stop!
Oh, what is it now?

Artie? Artie jumps from the spotlight. Artie lands clumsily on a hanging cloud. Artie leaps awkwardly from cloud to cloud. The audience stares in awe. After one last leap, he swings down on the Cherub's cable sending the little person up in the air. Artie lands on the stage in between the Villains and Shre He stands facing the Villains.
Who really thinks we need to settle things this way? The Evil Knights think about it and raise their hands. Th other Villains follow suit.
You're telling me you just want to be Villains your whole lives? This gives the Villains pause. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 110.
But we are Villains. It's the only thing we know.
Didn't you ever wish you could be something else? The Villains aren't convinced.
Well, it's easy for you to say. You're not some evil enchanted tree.
You morons! Don't listen to him!
Another Evil Tree covers Prince Charming's mouth and then motions to Artie.
What Steve's trying to say here is that it's hard to come by honest work when the whole world's against you.
Right, thanks Ed.

Okay, fair enough. You're right. I'm not a talking tree. But, ya know, a good friend of mine once told me that just because people treat you like a villain, or an ogre... Artie shares a look with Shrek.
... or just some loser... The Fairy-tale Villains listen intently.
...it doesn't mean you are one. The Evil Tree tightens his grip as Prince Charming strugg to break free. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 111.
The thing that matters most is what you think of yourself. Artie commands the stage.

If there's something you really want, or there's someone you really want to be, then the only person standing in your way ...is you. Artie points at Rumplestiltskin directly in front of him. Rumplestiltskin is alarmed.
Me?
Get `im lads!
No, no, no! What I mean is: each of you is standing in your own way!
Oooooooh! The Headless Horseman breaks through the crowd.
I've always wanted to play the flute. The Fairy-tale Villains and Creatures look at each other. The Evil Queen steps up.
I`d like to open up a spa in France. The Villains nod in agreement.
I grow daffodils! Complete silence as everyone stares at Hook.

And they're beautiful! Captain Hook looks thoughtfully at his sword, then throws down. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 112. The pirates throw theirs down, followed by the witches an Evil Knights. The evil knight holding Pinocchio is thinki about it when Pinocchio reaches over and takes the ax fro him. The weapons pile up in the middle of the stage. Ever else cheers and starts to mingle, introducing themselves shaking hands. Gingerbread Man high fives with an Evil Knight. Fiona is untied. Mabel walks up to Doris and lightly punches her on the ja Doris returns the sign of affection by punching Mabel in jaw, but a bit too hard, sending her falling to the groun Suddenly, Prince Charming kicks himself free of the Evil and charges them. He grabs a sword from the discard pile raises it up, his aim set at Artie.

Aaaahhhh! Despite his fear, Artie faces Prince Charming bravely. As Prince Charming charges, Shrek finds the strength to brea his chains. Just before Prince Charming strikes, a chain whips into frame, wrapping around the sword. Shrek pulls Prince Charming around in a circle, away from Artie. Furi he charges Shrek and stabs him with the sword. Charming l go and Shrek stumbles back with the weapon impaled in him and falls to the floor, groaning. Prince Charming beams, and laughs. He turns to the audien
A new era finally begins! The audience cowers. Shrek looks up smiling and nods at Fiona and Artie.
Now, all of you, bow before your king! Shrek casually rises up behind him and clears his throat.
Ah-hem. Charming turns around. Shrek lifts his arm revealing that was never really stabbed.
You need to work on your aim. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 113. Charming is stunned.
This was supposed to be my happily ever after. Prince Charming is paralyzed. Shrek drops the sword and g him by the shirt-front, lifting him off of his feet. He winces, but is still defiant.
Well I guess you need to keep looking... Shrek looks at Fiona and at his friends and smiles.

...cause I'm not giving up mine. Shrek sets Prince Charming down and signals DRAGON. She casually tips the tower over with her tail. A shadow fall over Prince Charming. He turns and sees the tower falling toward him, his body perfectly framed up in the princesse window.
Mommy? It crashes down and he's trapped inside. As the dust clears, the crown rolls across the stage. Art stops it with his foot and slowly picks it up.

It's yours if you want it, you know, but this time it's your choice. Artie considers it. He looks at Shrek, who is smiling proudly at him. Artie turns to the audience and holds out the crown to th They cheer him. Artie places the crown on his head. The crowd goes nuts. the audience, Raul sobs with joy.

Ar-tie! Ar-tie! Ar-tie! Ar-tie! Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 114. Everybody cheers as the Fairy-tale Creatures and Villains Artie up on their shoulders and carry him off. Donkey and Puss, still in each other's bodies, watch as Artie gets carried away. In a puff of smoke, Merlin suddenly appears. He looks aro confused, clutching his show ticket.
Uh, excuse me, that's my seat. Suddenly he is thrown back against the front of the stage Donkey and Puss confront him.
(in Donkey's body) Okay, senor hocus-y pocus-y. The time has come to rectify some wrongs!
(in Puss' body) Although I have been enjoying these "cat baths."
(in Donkey's body) Please say you didn't.
Uh... alright, alright...look.. Merlin rubs his hands together.

You're gonna feel a little pinch, and possibly some lower intestinal discomfort, but this should do the trick. Merlin rolls up his sleeves, and prepares to make with th magic. He lets loose with a bright burst of magic. It tak moment for Donkey and Puss to recover. They eye each othe cautiously.
Are you..? Donkey lifts his hoof and inspects it carefully.
I'm me again! Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 115. Puss checks out his own paws.
And I am not you! Donkey and Puss give each other a big hug.
Alright! The two of them turn and walk away together. Merlin is behind them, smoking fingers and all. Suddenly eyes grow wide.
Oops. Ah, never mind. We see that Donkey still has Puss' tail and Puss had Donkey's. Merlin slips away. Shrek and Fiona watch Artie in the distance.
What'd I tell ya? I think the kid's going to be a great King.
Well, for what it's worth, you would have too. Shrek smiles, and touches Fiona's belly.
I have something much more important in mind. They kiss. The camera pulls back to see everyone celebrating around Shrek and Fiona as they kiss.
A wide-shot of a sunny morning in the swamp. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 116.
Shrek grabs a "gourd" bottle and creates an ogre shake ou slug juice, eye balls and worms. He walk over to join Fio by the fire.
Ah, finally. Shrek gives Fiona the "gourd" bottle and she places a nip on it. Two ogre babies crawl up onto Fiona's lap.

Da da. A third ogre baby appears at Shrek's feet. He bends down pick him up. One big happy family of five. Shrek laughs and gives the babies and Fiona a hug. The front door opens up to reveal Puss and Donkey.

Hey! I smell Shrek Jr. The Dronkeys come swarming in behind Donkey. Dragon peers through the door. Shrek with a safety pin in his mouth is doing his best at changing diapers. He twists the diaper around and the bab goes flying off screen and lands in a diaper that Fiona i holding. She smiles at Shrek. The swamp house is overrun with Dronkeys, ogre babies and dirty diapers. Puss sits next to an ogre baby that has a pacifier in his mouth. He takes the pacifier out of his mouth, shoves it Puss' mouth and gives Puss a big hug. Another baby comes crawling into frame and starts to tug on Puss' tail. A tu of war ensues. The ogre babies are bathing in a pot of water (a la a bea from the Nightmare scene). One of the babies farts in the water as Shrek comes in and scoops them up. Shrek laughs. Donkey is playing "peek-a-boo" with his ears. A baby ogre laughs. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 117.
Peek-a-boo. Peek-a-boo. A baby ogre pulls ear wax from Shrek's ear. The baby uses the wax to draw squiggly lines on a piece of paper.

Bouncy, bouncy, bouncy boy. The Queen is bouncing a baby ogre on her lap. The baby pu and the Queen smiles. There is a knock at the door. Donkey is laying on the flo holding a bottle with all four hooves, drinking the milk. Shrek grabs the bottle out of Donkey's mouth.
Hey. Shrek opens the front door to reveal the Dwarf.
Where's the baby? Shrek puts a bottle into the Dwarf's mouth and slams the door.
Fiona slides one of the babies down a "slip `n slide" mad out of mud shot from geysers. Shrek slides down himself. The babies scramble out of the way as Shrek slides by, spraying mud everywhere.

Shrek and Fiona are diapering two of the babies in perfec unison. They continue diapering, Fiona holds up the third baby and Shrek holds up an unhappy, diapered Puss. Shrek grabs a gourd bottle off of a shelf. He tosses it t Fiona. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 118. Fiona stands holding one baby over her shoulder. She catc the gourd thrown to her, twirls it around (a la Tom Cruis Cocktail), lifts up her leg where another baby is perched her foot and puts the gourd in the baby's mouth. Shrek is burping a baby over his shoulder. The baby burps Fiona has a baby over her shoulder and the baby burps. A Dronkey sitting on a chair does a flame-belch and an ogre baby crawling by farts which causes a flame thrower effec into the fireplace. Shrek and Fiona tuck all the babies into bed.
sense_profile: a flame thrower effec into the fireplace

text: Well, what shall we do now?
Shrek and Fiona are sound asleep, snoring.
A baby starts to cry.
I got it. The camera trucks out.
